resources.string:
Chaterest is an app where people from all over the world with similar interests can interact with each other. You can chat with people who also love what you love. 

Stuck with BSoD on your Computer? 
Or curious to learn the techniques of chess? 
Or don't know how to play a chord? 

You can get the answers here!
 
Chaterest brings you three major categories: 
-Tech 
-Sports 
-Music 

		Choose whatever category you want and ask your questions right away. Or feel like an expert? Then you can answer questions from others to improve yourself. Hope you enjoy the app!

Chaterest was created by Team Haddy, a group of four Computer Science and Engineering Students who are passionate about Technology. 

Deepak B 
Dhanush P 
Harini V 
Anuvitha G


We've always been been as creative as possible, even with our team name (which is the combination of the first letters in our names). We have created this app with the aim of making it useful as well as secure. Your identity remains completely anonymous unless you expose it yourself. User privacy is our priority.

If you have any feedback regarding the app, feel free to write to chaterest@gmail.com

Thank you for downloading Chaterest!
